tool_description: Scans database systems to discover and inventory all backup jobs, collecting metadata about job configurations, schedules, and target systems.

database_type.description: Database system type (mysql, postgresql, oracle, sqlserver, mongodb)

connection_string.description: Database connection string with authentication details

include_system_jobs.description: Whether to include system-generated backup jobs

error_messages: Connection failed: Verify database connection string format and network accessibility.
Authentication error: Check username/password or certificate validity in connection string.
Unsupported database type: Use one of [mysql, postgresql, oracle, sqlserver, mongodb].
Insufficient permissions: Database user must have backup job read permissions.
usage: Provide database_type and connection_string to discover all backup jobs. Set include_system_jobs to false to exclude automatically generated jobs.

job_count.description: Total number of backup jobs discovered

job_names.description: List of backup job names found

job_types.description: Types of backup jobs (full, differential, incremental, log)
